snippet: Are we being more selective about the kinds of things we choose to capture digitally at concerts and other events? Maybe our reasons for recording are maturing, evolving past basic impulse.
abstract: Are we being more selective about the kinds of things we choose to capture digitally at concerts and other events? Maybe our reasons for recording are maturing, evolving past basic impulse.

headline.main: Digital Diary:  Does Technology Replace Memory or Augment It?
